name: Delta System - BWG
description: The BWG is a sculpture of the Delta System series. It is unique and in physical format. Created using an algorithm added to the design, it was designed on the computer and executed by hand. Constituted by the union of card cells that shape a totally palpable body. The work solidifies an artistic view of power relations in society in a three-dimensional way. Totally flexible and changeable, as society adjusts and acquires different forms according to the context in which it is inserted. The buyer will receive the physical work anywhere in the world. @M.4.M_A.A.D
